data.title: Christchurch School â€“ Coed Boarding High School in Virginia
data.meta_description: Enroll your child in our private, coed boarding school where a sense of community and knowledgeable faculty help them excel academically. Learn more here.
data.text:
One hour east of Richmond, near Hampton Roads, Williamsburg, and Fredericksburg, just south of Northern Virginia and Washington, DC.

CCS is a private, coed, Episcopal boarding and day school for grades 9-12.

At Christchurch School, we combine 100 years of tradition, community, and relationships with a dynamic and innovative approach to learning that meets each child where they are and prepares them to succeed in a rapidly changing world.

49 Seahorse Lane

Christchurch, Virginia 23031

804.758.2306

Located in Virginia's River Realm. Our location is safe, secure,

and beautiful! CCS is a small, 24/7 community of 219 students

in grades 9-12, with onsite health care support and

70% of faculty living on campus.

Our waterfront campus is 125 acres of wooded trails

and manicured sports fields in Middlesex County,

1 hour east of Richmond and 2 and 1/2 hours

south of the Northern, VA/Washington, DC area.

At Christchurch School, students discover skills, aptitudes, and talents they didn't know they had.

The ultimate payoff from a Christchurch education is more than just earning a diploma or being accepted into the right college.
